p: The synergism of EDTA with other antimicrobial agents has been widely studied. EDTA can enhance the antimicrobial activity of weak acids against Gram-negative bacteria [ 101]. Economou et al. [ 99] demonstrated that EDTA can help enhance the antibacterial effect of nisin and extend the shelf life of food. The combined effect of EDTA with an oregano EO on modified atmosphere-packaged chicken liver meat has also been investigated [ 102]. Microbiological data have shown that the combined use of EDTA (20 mM) oregano EO (0.1% and0.3% v/wt) under modified atmosphere packaging (30%CO 2/70%N 2) can extend the shelf life in comparison with aerobic packaging.
